flawed_nl_solution:
Each hour Jimmy makes 60min / 10min/pizza = <<60/10=6.0>>6.0 Pizzas
The number of total pizzas made equals 7 hours x 6.0 pizzas/hour = <<7*6.0=24.0>>24.0 pizzas
The amount of total flour used equals 24.0 pizzas x 0.5 kg/pizza = <<24.0*0.5=12.0>>12.0 kg
The amount of flour left equals 22 kg - 12.0 kg = <<22-12.0=10.0>>10.0 kg
The number of pizzas Jimmy can make is 10.0kg / 0.5kg/pizza = <<10.0/0.5=20.0>>20.0 pizzas

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 42.0, not 24.0. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
